title: Cookie Policy
essential_cookies_text: These are necessary for our website to function. They do things like store your cart items, remember your language settings, and keep you logged in.
security_cookies_text: These protect your account and prevent fraud. They verify your identity and make sure no one else can access your information.
analytics_cookies_text: These help us understand how people use our site. We learn what pages are popular, what features need improving, and how we can give you a better experience.
advertising_cookies_text: These cookies help us show you ads you might actually care about, based on your interests. They also stop you from seeing the same ads repeatedly.
personalization_cookies_text: These cookies make your experience more tailored to you. They remember your preferences, so you get recommendations, search results, and ads that are more relevant.
your_control_text: You have choices about how we use cookies. Here's how you can manage them:
browser_settings_text: You can change your browser's settings to block or allow certain cookies.
privacy_settings_text: Visit our privacy settings page to adjust your preferences
mobile_devices_text: You'll usually find cookie controls in your device's settings menu.
please_note_text: Please Note: Blocking some cookies might make parts of our website less functional.
questions_text: If you have questions about our cookie policy, please contact us at
informed_experience_text: We want you to feel informed and in control of your online experience. This policy aims to give you the clear information you need.
changes_policy_text: We may update this policy from time to time. If we make significant changes, we'll notify you appropriately.
